messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
{~C3}...Poltergeists are among these.{~N}Negative emotions, like fear,
{~C3}worry or stress manifest{~N}into external energy with{~N}physical effects.
{~C3}Nightmares have, in some cases,{~N}been shown to trigger them.
{~C3}However, such phenomena do not{~N}appear to happen to just anyone.
{~C3}Although it's not clear why,{~N}adolescents, especially girls,{~N}are prone to such occurrences.{~E}
{~C3}Hearing this, the hunter{~N}armed with bow and arrow said,{~N}]I will kill the lizard.]
{~C3}But upon meeting his opponent,{~N}he held back, taunting,{~N}]Who's afraid of a reptile?]
{~C3}At this, the furious lizard{~N}hissed, ]I'll swallow you up{~N}in a single bite!]
{~C3}Then the huge creature{~N}attacked, jaws opened wide.
{~C3}This was what the man wanted.{~N}Calmly drawing his bow, he shot{~N}into the lizard's gaping mouth.
{~C3}Effortlessly, the arrow flew,{~N}piercing the defenseless maw,
This is from an old fairy tale.{~N}I remember reading it as a kid.{~E}
There's a hanging key.{~N}It's just out of reach.{~E}
The key went down the drain.{~E}
The ball is stuffed{~N}inside the pipe.{~E}
There is a drainage valve.{~N}Do you want to open it?{~S4}
It drains into the wrong hole.{~N}Maybe I could plug{~N}that up somehow.{~E}
There is a {~C2}Library reserve key{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
